entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 29 January 2023
